mapper.insert: INSERT INTO boards (title, content, user_id, created_at, updated_at) VALUES (#{title}, #{content}, #{userId}, #{createdAt}, #{updatedAt})
mapper.select: SELECT id, title, content, user_id, created_at, updated_at FROM boards WHERE id = #{id}
SELECT id, title, content, user_id, created_at, updated_at FROM boards ORDER BY id DESC
